root.message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 3-b-3, translated into all languages

languages.language: Indicator 3.b.3: Proportion of health facilities that have a core set of relevant essential medicines available and affordable on a sustainable basis
Indicateur 3.b.3 : Proportion d’établissements de santé qui disposent d’un ensemble de base de médicaments essentiels pertinents disponibles et abordables sur une base durable
